page.title: 06FARMING CUCKFIELD RURAL
page.content: Most of the farmers in the area are tenents of large estates or investment companies.Many of the holdings consist of several small farms amalgamated i.e. Sidnye,Mizbrooks and Collins farms, owned by an estate but tenented to a father and son as a 400acre mixed farm. One of the exceptions is Upper and Lower Sparks farm,170 acres of arable land,worked single handed by the owner, the farmhouses having been sold.It is common to sell the often historic farm house with a large garden as a private home,to raise capital,and for the farmer to live in a farm cottage.These become vacant as the number of workers falls,due to increased mechanisation and increased labour costs, coupled with a poor return in relation to capital invested.
